content_html:
Kathmandu, September 12

Sushila Karki, the new prime minister of the interim government, will be sworn in tonight.

According to the President’s Press Adviser, Kiran Pokharel, the swearing-in ceremony will take place at 9 PM at the presidential residence, Sheetal Niwas.

He told Onlinekhabar, “First, the President will appoint the new prime minister of the interim government, and then the new prime minister will begin the work of the Council of Ministers.”

The post Office of the President announces: New Prime Minister’s oath at 9 PM appeared first on OnlineKhabar English News.
